title: CONTEST: Draven Day Cosplay Competition
body:
It has come to Draven's attention that everyone has yet to buy into Draven's glorious new plans. That's okay, Draven understands - other, less awesome people can't possibly hope to dress as smoothly as the Glorious Executioner (and they're just not as awesome). 

Still, everyone deserves a chance. Prove that your cosplay meets all Draven Day requirements, and Draven may reward you.

http://i.imgur.com/0B2c1lK.jpg

To enter submit a photo of yourself [**HERE**](http://woobox.com/pn3dsp) in costume as your favourite champion, but with Draven's face. You can create a mask, use makeup or facepaint, or speed-grow an epic mustache - anything you like.

Entries will be judged on originality and humour, and your ability to capture the essence of Draaaaven.

Winners will receive 3000 RP and their choice of one Draven skin from the following:
- Soul Reaver Draven
- Gladiator Draven
- Primetime Draven
- Pool Party Draven
- Beast Hunter Draven

replies.body: Why can't we get draven draven
